differences.gitbook: UPDATE STATUS ON DEVELOPMENT: AJ and Advanceameywu gave the updates on Collaboration Skill Database; they presented the one-pager document highlighting the scope of the project and they are currently focused on the skills form and database. Rojo suggested that the database could be in the same place as the exsisting database because it would be great if the databases are interconnected, he also suggested an initial design on an Excel sheet showing the relationship of form with the database.
